tourName: Sri Lanka off the beaten track holiday
generalInfo:
Welcome to our unique 14-day authentic off the beaten track holiday of Sri Lanka...

This holiday is tailor-made for you by your local guides Rajiv who has been working with tourists for the past 20 years and has an immense knowledge of his 'teardrop' island he calls home together with his wife Gillian. Rajiv has included both touristy activities and off the beaten track locations...

On your arrival in Sri Lanka, you will be met by your local team Gillian and Rajiv. We are both passionate about travel and local food and this makes us the best local team to travel with during your holiday.

We have designed this holiday for you from start to end with one key element in mind which is peace of mind.

Sri Lanka a paradise that we proudly call the Pearl of the Indian Ocean is surrounded by golden sandy beaches, majestic rainforest-covered mountains, cascading waterfalls, UNESCO heritage sites, sacred rock temples, tea plantations, and ancient royal cities.

During your holiday you will visit the must-see touristy sites of Sri Lanka and many off the beaten track locations including UNESCO world heritage sites and national parks.

One key element to consider when visiting Sri Lanka is the tropical weather. We as responsible and honest travel agents recommend this holiday between February and October to minimize the chance of rain especially when you are relaxing at the beach.

Our standard itinerary gives you the opportunity to encounter herds of wild elephants, the elusive leopards, and endangered sloth bears of Sri Lanka including hundreds of bird species in the company of a local guide or ranger. cultural, natural, and historic attractions are unsurpassed in this authentic off the beaten track holiday of Sri Lanka including amazing local food.

All hotels are locally owned and managed and you will be transported in the comfort of your own privet chauffeur-driven vehicle, where you sit back and enjoy a bespoke itinerary that is as unique and individual as you. All our vehicles are fully insured and driven by experienced chauffeurs.

Anyone can visit Sri Lanka, but not everyone gets the chance to chat over dinner or travel together with a local host, take a safari at dawn with a knowledgeable ranger, and get the best seats on one of the most scenic railway journeys in the world. You need a local specialist to provide you with insider information, make arrangements using local contacts, and advise on the best times of year to visit different areas.

Our family-operated company has been doing just that since 2004 and 50% of our business comes from personal referrals and repeat business. We strongly believe in responsible and sustainable tourism and are proud of the fact that 90% of your tour fee stays in Sri Lanka.

Sri Lanka is ready for you, so why not contact us today and allow us to design a unique, tailor-made Sri Lanka holiday to suit your specific interests and ideas.

We look forward to hearing from you today.

WELLCOME TO SRI LANKA MACHANG!
